fotoshop.resources

Class ResourceManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • fotoshop.resources.ResourceManager

  • public abstract class ResourceManager
extends java.lang.Object
    ResourceManager simply contains methods used for obtaining resources for textual and other language dependant data. * @author Ben
    Editor messages, Command Words and Filter names may be included within:
    EditorText.properties : Holds alternatives to the default editor messages. This file MUST be included for any text messages to appear
    CommandWord.properties : Holding any alternatives to the default command words. Any new command words must be added to the CommandWord enum class
    Filter.properties : Holds the names for any filters that are available. Additional filters MUST be added in the Editor class filterMap.

      • getEditorText

        public static java.lang.String getEditorText(java.lang.String textKey)
        Finds the text associated with the textKey. Can be used to find internationalised versions of Editor display messages
        Parameters:
        textKey - The message key to find in the editorBundle
        Returns:
        Returns the string associated with the parameter key

      • getCommandWords

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getCommandWords()
        Finds the text associated the command words. Can be used to find internationalised versions of the command words
        Returns:
        Returns a map of the command word text

      • getFilter

        public static java.lang.String getFilter(java.lang.String filterKey)
        Finds the text associated with the filter. Can be used to find internationalised versions of filter name
        Parameters:
        filterKey - The key of the filter to find in the filterBundle
        Returns:
        Returns the filter name associated with the parameter key
